title: Make urf permanant
body: I never get tired of urf and I'm sure a lot of people like me only play for urf and maybe aram, that's the type of players we are. How can you grow if you don't listen to your customers? Make new urf skins, dumb down the CDR, do something to even the odds between us. We want urf either on live servers or pbe, it's too fun and i don't ever play when it's not on. Leave summoners rift to the people that enjoy it, I'm sure alot of them don't care for urf. Comment below if you agree. Bring urf back please!{{summoner:39}}
